animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 16: The Eleventh Striker
otherNames: Detective Conan Movie 16: 11 Nin-me no Striker, 劇場版　名探偵コナン　11人目のストライカー
synopsis:
After an interaction with J-League professional players, Conan and his friends watch the big match between the Tokyo Spirits and Gamba Osaka, only to find out that a bomb has been planted in the stadium.
It is now up to Conan once again to foil the culprit's plans and reveal his/her true identity.
